DOC.brief_summary: This study is designed to study the effect of a family based mindfulness training program with special focus on diet and nutrition on weight and cardiovascular risk markers in obese adolescents.
DOC.brief_title: Effect of Mindful Eating on Body Mass Index in Obese Adolescents
DOC.detailed_description: 40 obese adolescents would be randomized into either a mindfulness based behavioral modification program or standard dietary counseling. At least one parent would be expected to attend the counseling sessions. Patients would be followed for a period of 6 months. Anthropometric parameters, questionaiires relating to quality of life and blood tests would be drawn at baseline and and at 6 months.
DOC.criteria: Inclusion Criteria BMI at or greater than the 95th percentile for age and gender Exclusion Criteria
